### Load Data
```{r}
raw_data <- read.csv("Taipei City Energy Poverty.csv", header = TRUE)
raw_data
```
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
plot <- ggplot(data=raw_data, aes(x=X2020income, y=X2020power)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method="lm", se=TRUE, color="blue", fill="lightblue") +
  labs(title="X-Y Scatter Plot with Regression Line", x="X", y="Y")
plot
```
